comment.diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,42 @@
+| Family         | Variant         |   Claimed NIST Level | PQ-only Code Point   | Hybrid Elliptic Curve   | Hybrid Code Point   |
comment.body:
Compared to the Google Docs spreadsheet, this is missing several pieces of information:

- algorithm version / NIST Round
- old numbering
- the x25519 hybrids
